Class RangedEnemy

  • java.lang.Object
    • Enemy
      • RangedEnemy

  • public class RangedEnemy
extends Enemy

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RangedEnemy()
      Creates a default RangedEnemy object with a Gun
      RangedEnemy(double x, double y, double xVel, double yVel)
      Creates a custom RangedEnemy object with a Gun, specific velocity at location x,y

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void draw(processing.core.PApplet drawer)
      Draws a graphical representation of this RangedEnemy at its respective location by checking the RangedEnemy's current direction
      void fireToPlayer(Player player)
      Fires a bullet to the location of player
      Gun getGun()
      Returns the Gun this enemy is holding

    • Constructor Detail

      • RangedEnemy

        public RangedEnemy()
        Creates a default RangedEnemy object with a Gun

      • RangedEnemy

        public RangedEnemy(double x,
                   double y,
                   double xVel,
                   double yVel)
        Creates a custom RangedEnemy object with a Gun, specific velocity at location x,y
        Parameters:
        x - the x coordinate of this enemy
        y - the x coordinate of this enemy
        xVel - the x velocity component of this enemy
        yVel - the y velocity component of this enemy

    • Method Detail

      • fireToPlayer

        public void fireToPlayer(Player player)
        Fires a bullet to the location of player
        Parameters:
        player - the player object this RangedEnemy has to shoot/target

      • getGun

        public Gun getGun()
        Returns the Gun this enemy is holding
        Returns:
        the Gun object that belongs to this enemy

      • draw

        public void draw(processing.core.PApplet drawer)
        Draws a graphical representation of this RangedEnemy at its respective location by checking the RangedEnemy's current direction
